document.full_text: nearly a week after their home town was annihilated in a catastrophic tsunami, the 1,000-plus survivors of the small japanese fishing town of otsuchi are hanging by a thread.
document.title: for japan tsunami survivors, woes keep mounting
lines_and_colors: nearly a week after their home town was annihilated in a catastrophic tsunami, the 1,000-plus survivors of the small japanese fishing town of otsuchi are hanging by a thread.
